pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plots Survival Curves Element by Element // Plots survival models from the 'survival' package. Additionally, it plots curves of multistate models from the 'mstate' package. Typically, a plot is drawn by the sequence survplot(), confIntArea(), survCurve() and nrAtRisk(). The separation of the plot in this 4 functions allows for great flexibility to make a custom plot for publication.
